com.independentsoft.exchange
Class RecurringDateTransition

java.lang.Object
  com.independentsoft.exchange.Transition
      com.independentsoft.exchange.RecurringDateTransition

public class RecurringDateTransition
extends Transition

Represents a time zone transition that occurs on a specific date each year.
